mapper.select: SELECT BI_TITLE, BI_HEADCNT, BI_FDCATEGORY, BI_MEETINGDAT, BI_MEETINGTIM FROM BABSANG_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_INFO( BI_TITLE, BI_CONTENT, BI_MEETINGDAT, BI_MEETINGTIM, BI_HEADCNT, BI_FDCATEGORY, BI_CLOSED, UI_NUM) VALUSE( #{biTitle}, #{biContent}, #{biMeetingDat}, #{biMeetingTim}, #{biHeadCnt}, #{biFdCategory}, #{biClosed}, #{uiNum} )
